description: When an uploaded image is registered through the ec2 api, it doesn't pull the right architecture from the manifest.  This means that users can't run 32-bit instances.
title: registering an image doesn't use architecture from manifest

comments.content: When an uploaded image is registered through the ec2 api, it doesn't pull the right kernel and ramdisk from the manifest.  This means that users have to specify the kernel and ramdisk when they run the instance.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
